sentence: It also finds the Republicans running for governor, incumbent Brian Kemp and former Sen. David Perdue, outpacing Democrat Stacey Abrams 49-44 and 47-45, respectively.
title: Morning Digest: Join us for our liveblog tonight as the 2022 primaries get underway in Texas

sentence: Governors ? GA-Gov: A new poll of Georgia's Republican primary for governor from Fox5 Atlanta, conducted by the GOP firm InsiderAdvantage, shows former Sen. David Perdue gaining ground on incumbent Brian Kemp.
title: Morning Digest: With filing closed, here's how things looks in North Carolina's new House districts
